name: fluxus.js
body:
### fluxus.js - JavaScript Hack Art.
Fluxus.js encourages a "do-it-yourself" aesthetic, and values simplicity over complexity. Fluxus.js includes a strong current of anti-commercialism and an anti-art sensibility, disparaging the conventional market-driven art world in favor of an artist-centered creative practice.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git clone git@github.com:jessecravens/fluxus.js.git
```

### Authors and Contributors
Jesse Cravens (@jdcravens)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
